aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: Over 30 years of experience in fire safety
aboutUs.historyContent:
Matbud Systemy Ppoż. sp. z o.o. was founded in 1993. We were the first in Poland to introduce a comprehensive fire protection systems service offer, expanding our activities to include installation and service of all fire protection equipment: smoke extraction systems, fire barriers, FAS/SAP, emergency lighting, DSO.

We confirm our competencies through certification at the Fire Protection Services Certification Center - we are the first company certified in fire ventilation and the second in fire barriers in Poland. Today, we offer the full range of services: fire protection system design, installation, service, and maintenance, ensuring compliance with PN-EN standards and building regulations.
aboutUs.missionContent: Our mission is to protect lives and property by delivering the highest quality fire safety solutions. We strive to ensure the highest safety standards, building client trust through reliability, professionalism, and continuous improvement of our services.

images.title: Fire Alarm Systems SSP/SAP
images.description: Installation of advanced fire alarm systems in commercial and industrial facilities.
images.detailedDescription: Fire Alarm Systems (SSP) and Fire Alarm Panels (SAP) are advanced technical solutions that provide early fire detection and automatic notification of threats. Our systems meet the highest safety standards in accordance with PN-EN standards and building regulations.
features: Central control panels with addressable function
Integration with smoke extraction and emergency lighting systems
images.seoKeywords: fire alarm systems, SSP, SAP, fire detectors, fire panels, fire alarms, fire detection systems

images.title: Natural Smoke Extraction Systems
images.description: Design and installation of smoke vents and natural smoke extraction systems.
images.detailedDescription: Natural smoke extraction systems use natural forces to remove smoke and hot gases from buildings. Smoke vents and smoke extraction windows open automatically in case of fire, enabling natural ventilation and improving evacuation conditions.
features: Smoke extraction windows with electric drive
Automatic opening in case of fire
images.seoKeywords: natural smoke extraction, smoke vents, smoke extraction windows, smoke extraction systems, fire ventilation, fire vents

images.title: Mechanical Smoke Extraction Systems
images.description: Installation of smoke extraction fans and mechanical smoke removal systems.
images.detailedDescription: Mechanical smoke extraction systems use high-performance fans to force removal of smoke and hot gases from buildings. They are particularly effective in facilities where natural smoke extraction is insufficient.
benefits: Effective smoke removal in all conditions
Applicable in facilities without daylight access
images.seoKeywords: mechanical smoke extraction, smoke extraction fans, mechanical smoke extraction systems, mechanical fire ventilation, smoke extraction ducts

images.title: Emergency and Evacuation Lighting
images.description: Comprehensive emergency lighting systems and evacuation signs.
images.detailedDescription: Emergency and evacuation lighting systems provide adequate visibility conditions during evacuation in case of main power failure. They ensure safe evacuation through lighting of evacuation routes and signs indicating exits.
features: Compliance with PN-EN 1838 and PN-EN 50172 standards
images.seoKeywords: emergency lighting, evacuation lighting, evacuation signs, emergency power supplies, anti-panic lighting, backup lighting

images.title: Fire Doors
images.description: Installation and maintenance of fire doors and fire gates.
images.detailedDescription: Fire doors and gates are a key element of passive fire protection. They provide fire zone isolation, delaying the spread of fire and smoke, giving time for evacuation and rescue operations.
features: Automatic closing in case of fire
images.seoKeywords: fire doors, fire gates, fire partitions, fire barriers, fire doors, CNBOP certificates

images.title: Sound Warning Systems DSO
images.description: Installation and maintenance of sound warning systems.
images.detailedDescription: Sound Warning Systems (DSO) provide effective notification of building users about fire hazards through sound and voice signals. These systems are essential in facilities where mass notification of threats is required.
images.seoKeywords: DSO, sound warning systems, sound systems, fire sirens, voice announcements, sound alarm systems

testimonials.quote: Matbud Systemy Ppoż. sp. z o.o. provided exceptional service from initial consultation to installation. Their team was professional, knowledgeable, and efficient.

testimonials.quote: We have been working with Matbud Systemy Ppoż. sp. z o.o. for over 10 years. Their maintenance services are reliable, and their technicians are always punctual and courteous.

testimonials.quote: The fire safety audit conducted by Matbud Systemy Ppoż sp. z o.o. was thorough and identified several areas for improvement that we hadn't considered before. Highly recommended!

testimonials.quote: After a minor fire incident, we upgraded our entire system with Matbud Systemy Ppoż. sp. z o.o. Their expertise and attention to detail gave us peace of mind.

testimonials.quote: Matbud Systemy Ppoż. sp. z o.o.'s emergency response was outstanding. They had our systems back online within hours after a power surge damaged our control panel.

cityPage.title: Fire Safety Systems in {city} - Fire Protection Installation & Service
cityPage.intro: Matbud Systemy Ppoż. sp. z o.o. is an experienced provider of professional fire safety services in {city} and surrounding areas. We offer comprehensive solutions: installation, maintenance and service of fire alarm systems (SSP), smoke ventilation, emergency lighting, and compliance audits.
cityPage.servicesTitle: Fire Protection Services in {city} - Installation, Service, Maintenance
cityPage.servicesDescription: Comprehensive fire safety services for businesses, offices, warehouses and residential buildings in {city}. Professional installation, regular maintenance and emergency service of fire protection systems:
servicesList: Fire alarm system installation and maintenance
Fire safety inspections and compliance audits
Fire safety training for your staff
cityPage.whyChooseTitle: Why Choose Matbud Systemy Ppoż. sp. z o.o.
cityPage.whyChooseDescription: As a leader in fire safety solutions in {city}, we offer over 30 years of experience in designing, installing and servicing fire protection systems. Our certified technicians are well-versed in local fire regulations. We have completed over 5000 projects, ensuring the highest safety standards and compliance with PN-EN standards and building regulations. We guarantee quick response to emergencies thanks to our 24/7 service.
cityPage.contactSubtitle: Fill out the form below and our local team will get back to you shortly

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.introduction: These Terms of Service govern the provision of services by Matbud Systemy Ppoż. Sp. z o.o. and define the rights and obligations of the parties in connection with the use of our fire safety services.

definitions.title: Definitions
items: "Company" means Matbud Systemy Ppoż. Sp. z o.o.
"Client" means a natural or legal person using the Company's services
"Services" means fire safety services provided by the Company
"Agreement" means the service agreement concluded between the Company and the Client

scope.title: Scope of Services
scope.content: The Company provides the following fire safety services:
items: Design and installation of fire alarm systems
Installation and maintenance of sprinkler systems
Installation of emergency lighting and exit signs
Fire safety inspections
Fire safety compliance audits
Fire safety training
Emergency service and system repairs
Preventive maintenance of fire protection equipment

obligations.title: Company's Obligations
items: Provide services in accordance with applicable regulations and standards
Use high-quality materials and equipment
Ensure qualified personnel for the execution of orders
Adhere to deadlines agreed with the Client
Provide emergency service during agreed hours
Store technical and warranty documentation
Conduct regular staff training

clientObligations.title: Client's Obligations
items: Provide all necessary information and documentation
Ensure access to the facility at agreed times
Comply with safety recommendations provided by the Company
Immediately report breakdowns and technical problems
Allow necessary inspections and tests to be carried out
Store technical documentation in a safe place
Adhere to the maintenance and inspection schedule

pricing.title: Pricing and Payments
items: Service prices are determined individually based on the scope of work
The Company issues VAT invoices in accordance with applicable regulations
Payment deadline is 14 days from the invoice date
In case of late payment, statutory interest will be charged
Costs of materials and equipment are charged separately
Prices do not include VAT, which is added in accordance with regulations

warranty.title: Warranty and Liability
warranty.content: The Company provides a warranty for the services and equipment provided in accordance with legal provisions. The warranty covers:
items: 24-month warranty for fire protection equipment
12-month warranty for installation works
Free removal of defects during the warranty period
Liability for damages caused by equipment defects
Limitation of liability to the value of the contract
Exclusion of liability for indirect damages

safety.title: Safety and Compliance
safety.content: The Company ensures that all services provided comply with:
items: Building law regulations
Fire safety standards
Technical requirements for fire protection systems
Manufacturers' recommendations for equipment
OHS regulations applicable at the facility
International safety standards

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.content: The Company undertakes to maintain the confidentiality of information provided by the Client, including:
items: Technical data of the facility
Information about security systems
Contact and address data
Details of projects carried out
Commercial and business information
Personal data of Client's employees

termination.title: Termination of Agreement
termination.content: The Agreement may be terminated in the following cases:
items: By mutual agreement of the parties
In case of a serious breach of the terms of the agreement
In case of insolvency of one of the parties
In case of force majeure preventing the performance of the agreement
With a 30-day notice period
With the obligation to settle completed works

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution
disputes.content: In case of disputes arising from the performance of the agreement:
items: The parties shall strive for an amicable settlement of the dispute
In the absence of an agreement, the dispute shall be resolved by the competent court
Polish law shall apply
The language of proceedings shall be Polish
The parties may use mediation
Court decisions are final

contact.title: Contact Regarding Terms of Service
contact.content: If you have questions regarding these Terms of Service, please contact us:
items: Email: matbud@m-so.pl
Address: Słocin 36F, 62-065 Grodzisk Wielkopolski

changes.title: Changes to Terms of Service
changes.content: The Company reserves the right to change these Terms of Service. Clients will be informed of any changes at least 30 days in advance via the website or directly.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: Matbud Systemy Ppoż. Sp. z o.o. respects the privacy of its users and is committed to protecting their personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal data.

dataCollection.title: What Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect the following types of personal data:
items: Contact data (name, surname, email address, phone number)
Address data (correspondence address, installation address)
Technical data (information about fire protection systems)
Communication data (correspondence history, inquiries)

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: We use your personal data for the following purposes:
items: Providing fire protection system installation and maintenance services
Communicating with clients and handling inquiries
Sending offers and quotes
Conducting safety inspections and audits
Fulfilling legal and regulatory requirements
Improving the quality of our services

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal data with third parties, except in the following cases:
items: When required by law or regulations
With your explicit consent
To provide services through our trusted partners
In case of a merger, acquisition, or sale of company assets

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We apply appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, loss, destruction, or modification. Our security measures include:
items: Encryption of data at rest and in transit
Regular updates of security systems
Limited access to personal data
Regular staff training on data security

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We store your personal data only for the time necessary to achieve the purposes for which it was collected, or for the time required by law. Retention periods may vary depending on the type of data and the purpose of its processing.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:
items: Right to access your personal data
Right to rectification of inaccurate data
Right to erasure of data (right to be forgotten)
Right to restriction of processing
Right to data portability
Right to object to processing
Right to withdraw consent

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We do not collect any cookies on this website.

contact.title: Contact Regarding Privacy
contact.content: If you have questions regarding this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:
items: Email: matbud@m-so.pl
Address: Słocin 36F, 62-065 Grodzisk Wielkopolski

changes.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. We will inform you of any significant changes via our website or directly, if required by law.

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Notice
cookieConsent.description: We do not collect any cookies on this website.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. It might have been moved or deleted.
